items.sentence: Don\'t just stand there like that. Come over here and help me.
I figured you wouldn\'t want to drink coffee so late at night.
Tom thought that the amulet would protect him from werewolves.
Tom thought that the best solution was the one Mary suggested.
Tom told Mary he wanted to stay in Boston for a few more days.
Tom told Mary that he was going to show her some old pictures.
Have you already decided where you\'re going to go to college?
Let\'s eat at the restaurant across the street from the hotel.
Tom waited for Mary to say something, but she remained silent.
Tom wanted to be just friends. However, Mary wanted much more.
